name: Pearle [Crypto Platform]
description:
Pearle - a platform that combines all your crypto wallets in one application. Now you can easily track your account balances from different wallets or crypto exchanges in one place. We do not have access to your funds, we only receive information through the API. It is possible to track not only crypto assets, but also your NFTs. Add important dates to the calendar or find tips from our team in it. Creating a watchlist and multiple portfolios will help you effectively control your finances.


This is an educational project
